reviews.content: Apple makes sure your getting up on time but it’s so abrupt that you wake up upset. This tweak helps you wake up happier by fading in your alarm. I definitely recommend this as it’s also customizable.
Working flawless on IPhone XS running IOS 12.4 with Chimera jailbreak
Rings at maximum level first, then at minimum, then slowly rises. When it rings at maximum, I wake up.
